ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Manage your source code dependencies by decorating your existing R code with special, 'roxygen'-style comments.
Manage your source code dependencies by decorating your existing R code with special, 'roxygen'-style comments.

name: r-deps
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.4.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-deps
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/deps_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/deps/deps_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5f35c0d44b95126de2a10a5c8fc7783a48d77e64c8bbf195fc335b338a48b429

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-remotes
    - r-renv
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-remotes
    - r-renv

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('deps')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('deps')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://hub.analythium.io/deps/, https://github.com/analythium/deps
  license: MIT
  summary: Manage your source code dependencies by decorating your existing R code with special, 'roxygen'-style comments.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: deps
# Type: Package
# Title: Dependency Management with 'roxygen'-Style Comments
# Version: 0.4.0
# Authors@R: c( person(given = "Peter", family = "Solymos", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0001-7337-1740"), role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "peter@analythium.io"), person(given = "Analythium Solutions Inc.", role = c("cph", "fnd")))
# Description: Manage your source code dependencies by decorating your existing R code with special, 'roxygen'-style comments.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# LazyLoad: yes
# Imports: renv, jsonlite, remotes
# RoxygenNote: 7.3.1
# Encoding: UTF-8
# BugReports: https://github.com/analythium/deps/issues

# Language: en-US
